dialogue.introduction: Such a great admiral makes me happy. I'm I-19. Yep, calling me 'Iku' is fine!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the submarine I-19. Yes, Iku! I sunk the carrier Wasp with my pride and joy, my oxygen torpedoes! I was even able to hit a battleship and destroyer that was waaaay ahead of the carrier! Don't you forget Iku, Sniper of the Ocean's great abilities... 'kay?
dialogue.secretary1: Admiral! You're not allowed to look away from Iku!
dialogue.secretary2: Nnfu~, you won't get mad no matter what I do, so I like you.
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral? Are your shoulders sti~ff? How's thi~s? Does it hurt? Ehehehehe.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral~! What were you thinking, keeping Iku waiting? Do you want to be punished again~?
dialogue.secretarymarried: A~dmi~ra~l! I'll massage your shoulders! ...Uuu, they're all stiff...
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, what i~s it? You wanna dive with Iku? Oka~y...here, a wetsuit! Doesn't that look great on youâ™ª Well now, let's dive together! ...Fufu, make sure you absolutely don't let go of my hand. Ready and splaaash!!
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, there's a message for you.
dialogue.equipment2: Fufu~. My sniper soul is burning~.
dialogue.equipment3: With this, I'll get all of them in one go!
dialogue.expedition_selection: With this, I'll get all of them in one go!
dialogue.resource_collection: With this, I'll get all of them in one go!
dialogue.instant_repair: With this, I'll get all of them in one go!
dialogue.development: With this, I'll get all of them in one go!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Just a li~ttle bit of repairing~
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Nn, I got beat... Once I'm better, I'll pay them back twice over!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Iku's torpedoes are itching to go!
dialogue.battle_start: Iku's torpedo strike, off it goes!
dialogue.air_battle: "Aim at me!" is what it feels like it's saying!
dialogue.night_battle: Admiral, I want a reward if I beat that one.
dialogue.night_attack: "Aim at me!" is what it feels like it's saying!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: "Aim at me!" is what it feels like it's saying!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: "Aim at me!" is what it feels like it's saying!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: "Aim at me!" is what it feels like it's saying!
dialogue.mvp: Iku had a great, dazzling victory! I'm expecting reward from you~
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Kuh! Is that the one targeting me?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Did you think you'd back me into a corner? It gets me fired up instead!
dialogue.sunk: Iku...is sinking...? Hey...Admiral...even if I'm not there...please...don't worry...okay...?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral? This cake is delicious! Iku wants more! Christmas puts Iku in a good mood!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, a happy New Year to you! Take care of me this year as well, will you?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's time for Setsubun! Our demon's role is...Taigei! Surface to the Setsubun battle depth! Te~! Demon's out! Ei, ei~!

hourly.0400: 0400. Really, didn't you fall asleep a bit there? Iku knows it.
hourly.0500: 0500. Hey... right now, you fell asleep, yeah?
hourly.0700: 0700! The beginning of a new day! ...I'm hungry~
hourly.1300: 1300! After lunch, I always want to take a nap~
hourly.1400: 1400. The weather this afternoon is great, so I want to go for a walk! Truthfully, I'm always in the water though~
hourly.1500: 1500. Admiral? What do you normally do at this time?
hourly.1700: 1700. Somehow, I'm itching to do something, you know?
hourly.2000: 2000! It was great to spend Iku's favourite time with you!
hourly.2100: 2100. So~ It's nearly time for tonight's performance!
hourly.2200: 2200. Whoops, I got all fired up~
hourly.2300: 2300. Almost time for Iku's sleep time, isn't it?
